name: A High Place
description:
Hello! i'm Andrea Di Bartolo, host of the Quarantine Jam 2021!

For this jam me and Claudio Scamporlino made a very little speedrunning game: A high place!

Very simple game, as we didnt' have very much time, basically its a short 3d platformer level with an atmospheric feel, you can run, jump, double jump and... going into the background!

thanks to everyone who took part in this game jam!!

Andrea Di Bartolo - 3d Art/Game Design/Coding

Claudio Scamporlino  Game logic/ Coding
